subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Carl Pettersson had five straight birdies on the front nine and finished with a birdie on the 18th hole for a one-stroke lead over Colt Knost after the third round of the RBC Heritage.
snippet: Carl Pettersson had five straight birdies on the front nine and finished with a birdie on the 18th hole for a one-stroke lead over Colt Knost after the third round of the RBC Heritage.
